title: Printer Redirecting not working correctly
author: MartinBraz
body_snippet:
Hello,

the Printer redirecting not working correctly. 

when i connect to an host with printer redirecting, then just only 4 of 8 printer are redirecting. When i use the Windows RemoteClient (mstsc.exe), all printer are redirected. 

When i connect to our windows server 2008 R2, then only 4 / 8 printers are redirected. When i connect to an other server, then 3/8 printer are redirected. It varies from remote server to remote server...

Environment:
2 PCs with Windows 10 Pro in a domain ...

comments.snippet:
Hello @sparerd ,

do you already know the cause of the bug? Because our Employee need your tool with the printer redirection to connect to our servers.

Thanks,
Samuel
comments.author: MartinBraz

comments.snippet: I have the same issue on multiple clients.  Not all the printers are being redirected.  The default printer is not and that of course is the one needed.  If I use the RDP client built into windows the printers show up properly.  And yes, the redirect printers option is selected.
comments.author: spineytoad
